member.name: M:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create SocketIO object with default options

member.name: M:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.#ctor
member.summary: Create SocketIO object with default options

member.name: P:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.Id
member.summary: An unique identifier for the socket session. Set after the connect event is triggered, and updated after the reconnect event.

member.name: P:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.Connected
member.summary: Whether or not the socket is connected to the server.

member.name: P:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.Disconnected
member.summary: Whether or not the socket is disconnected from the server.

member.name: M:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.On(System.String,System.Action{SocketIOClient.SocketIOResponse})
member.summary: Register a new handler for the given event.

member.name: M:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.Off(System.String)
member.summary: Unregister a new handler for the given event.

member.name: M:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.EmitAsync(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Emits an event to the socket
member.param: Any other parameters can be included. All serializable datastructures are supported, including byte[]

member.name: M:SocketIOClient.SocketIO.EmitAsync(System.String,System.Action{SocketIOClient.SocketIOResponse},System.Object[])
member.summary: Emits an event to the socket
member.param: will be called with the server answer.
Any other parameters can be included. All serializable datastructures are supported, including byte[]
